description: This file defines a LightningJS component named 'NotesList' responsible for rendering and managing a list of notes, including functionalities like adding, selecting, and deleting notes, with subscription to note updates and UI interactions.

methods.name: $itemTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of a note item, defaulting to 'Untitled' if not available.

methods.name: $itemUpdated
methods.description: Formats the 'updatedAt' timestamp of a note into a locale string.

methods.name: $rowColor
methods.description: Determines the background color of a note row based on selection state.

methods.name: $itemY
methods.description: Calculates the Y position of a note row based on its index.

methods.name: $trashColor
methods.description: Determines the color of the trash icon area based on hover state.

methods.name: $onTrashHover
methods.description: Handles hover state for trash icon to indicate deletion intent.

methods.name: $onTrashLeave
methods.description: Resets hover state when not hovering over trash icon.

methods.name: $onAddHover
methods.description: Handles hover effect for the add new note button.

methods.name: $onAddLeave
methods.description: Resets hover effect for the add new note button.

methods.name: $emitSelect
methods.description: Emits the selection of a note, updating internal state and calling an external callback if provided.

methods.name: $select
methods.description: Wrapper to emit selection event for a specific note ID.

methods.name: $handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note and selects it.

methods.name: $remove
methods.description: Handles deletion of a note with a confirmation mechanism, updates selection accordingly.
